item.title: Dread distortion pedal
item.description: This was my first effect pedal built. It is based on a clone of the Boss DS-1 classic distortion pedal. I was built for my music project Blood and Dust as part of an effect chain we use on a cello. It is primarily used to make sounds heavier, grittier and add this sense of dread that is permeating our music. Dread distortion pedal Dread distortion pedal Blood detail on the bottom of the pedal Input and output
